ol.li: Coronavirus Tax Relief and Economic Impact Payments

div.h1: Coronavirus Tax Relief and Economic Impact Payments

button.aria-label: Collapsed menu button. Press space to activate the menu. Then navigate using the tab key.

div.p: We are offering tax help for taxpayers, businesses, tax-exempt organizations and others – including health plans – affected by coronavirus (COVID-19).

td.p: We have started sending payments to taxpayers.

ul.li: Most people won't need to take any action.

div.h2: Latest Updates on Coronavirus Tax Relief
div.h3: Get answers to Economic Impact Payments questions
div.p: We are regularly updating our Economic Impact Payments and Get My Payment application frequently asked questions pages so check back often for the latest additions that answer many common questions.
div.h3: Get My Payment: Reasons you may get “Status Not Available”
div.p: The Get My Payment application will return “Status Not Available” if you are not eligible for a payment or we don’t have enough information yet to provide a status. See the IRS Statement on Get My Payment Application for details.
While we continue to process electronic returns and issue refunds, some IRS services are limited. Get up-to-date status on affected IRS operations and services.
Changes to filing and payment deadlines and economic impact payments are part of your COVID-19 relief.

a.title: Tax Day now July 15: Treasury, IRS extend filing deadline and federal tax payments

div.p: Your small or large business or tax-exempt organization may be eligible for COVID-19 relief.
If you’re a health plan administrator, COVID-19 relief also affects you.

a.title: IRS: High-deductible health plans can cover coronavirus costs
Economic Impact Payments Partner and Promotional Materials

li.a: Economic Impact Payments: Partner and Promotional Material

ul.li: Coronavirus.gov: Information for the public from the Coronavirus (COVID-19) Task Force at the White House
Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19): The latest public health and safety information from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
What the U.S. Government is Doing: A catalog of all U.S. government activities related to coronavirus. Available in both English and Spanish
